actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy

official_title: To require the design of the obverse side of the $1 coin to depict the Statue of Liberty.
short_title: United States Statue of Liberty $1 Coin Act of 1998

summary.text: United States Statue of Liberty $1 Coin Act of 1998 - Amends Federal currency law to require the obverse side of the $1 coin to have a design depicting the Statue of Liberty.

titles.title: United States Statue of Liberty $1 Coin Act of 1998
To require the design of the obverse side of the $1 coin to depict the Statue of Liberty.
